bioconda.name: porechop_abi
bioconda.summary: Adapter inferrence and removal of Oxford Nanopore reads.

biotools.summary: Porechop_ABI (ab initio) is an extension of Porechop whose purpose is to process adapter sequences in ONT reads.

bioschemas.name: Porechop_ABI
bioschemas.summary: Porechop_ABI (ab initio) is an extension of Porechop whose purpose is to process adapter sequences in ONT reads.
